## How to use these notes

Each chapter below links to a dedicated Quarto page that mixes theory, formulas, and AMA Toolbox
implementation details. Work through them in the suggested order to mirror the workflow implemented
in `AnalysisWorkflow`.

::: {.grid}
::: {.g-col-6}
### Data Preprocessing
From CSV ingestion to standardized `DatasetView` objects. Covers column normalization, aggregation,
imputation, and feature selection hooks.

[Read the chapter →](data-preprocessing.qmd)
:::
::: {.g-col-6}
### Correlation Analysis
Derives Pearson's coefficient, explains how we rank feature pairs, and shows how
`CorrelationAnalyzer` packages matrices for plots.

[Read the chapter →](correlation-analysis.qmd)
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Principal Component Analysis
Walks through the covariance matrix, eigendecomposition, variance ratios, and loadings exposed by
`PCAAnalyzer` and `PCAResult`.

[Read the chapter →](pca.qmd)
:::
::: {.g-col-6}
### Outlier Detection
Compares IQR fences, z-score screening, and Isolation Forest ensembles. Highlights when to combine
detectors for robust anomaly reports.

[Read the chapter →](outlier-detection.qmd)
:::
:::
